Translations.Text: Does he not know, when that which is in the graves is scattered abroad
And that which is in the chest is made manifest
That their Guardian Evolver had been well acquainted with them that day
The Disaster
What is the Disaster
And what will explain to you what the Disaster is
It is a day when humanity will be like scattered moths
And the mountains will be as wool
Then he whose scales will be heavy
Will be in a life of blessings and satisfaction
But he whose scale will be found light
Will have his home in a pit
And what will explain to you what this is
It is a fire blazing fiercely
The competition for accumulating diverts you
Until you all visit the graves
But no, you will soon know
Again, you will soon know
No, were you to know with certainty of mind
You will certainly see hellfire
Again, you will see it with certainty of sight
Then, you will be questioned that day about the pleasure you indulged in
By time
Indeed the human being is lost
Except those who have faith, work to make things right, and join together in the mutual teaching of truth, patience, and constancy
Woe to every scandalous, backbiter
Who accumulates wealth and counts it
Thinking that his wealth will make him last forever
By no means. He will surely be thrown into that which breaks into pieces
And what will explain to you about that which breaks into pieces
It is the fire of God kindled to a blaze
That mounts right up to the hearts
It will be made into a vault over them
In columns, extended
Do you not see how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant
Did He not make their treacherous plan go astray
And He sent against them flocks of birds
Striking them with stones of baked clay
Then He made them like an empty field of stalks and straw which has been eaten
For the security enjoyed by the Quraysh
Their security covering journeys by winter and summer
Let them adore the Guardian Evolver of this house
Who provides them with food against hunger, and with security against fear of danger
Do you see the one who denies the Judgment
They are those who repulse the orphan
And do not encourage the feeding of the indigent
So woe to the worshippers
Who are neglectful of their prayers
Those who want to be seen
But refuse to do even neighborly deeds
To you, We have granted the fountain of abundance
Therefore turn in prayer and sacrifice to your Lord
For he who hates you, he will be cut off
Say, O you who do not believe
I do not worship that which you worship
Nor will you worship that which I worship
And I will not worship that which you are accustomed to worshiping
Nor will you worship that which I worship
To you your way, and to me, my way
When the help of God and victory comes
And you see the people enter God's religion in crowds
Glorify by Praising your Guardian Evolver, and pray for His forgiveness, for He is Oft-Forgiving
May the hands of the father of the flame perish, and may he perish
No profit will he have for all his wealth, and all his gains
He will soon burn in a fire of a blazing flame
His wife will carry the wood as fuel
With a twisted rope of palm-leaf fiber around her neck
Say, He is God, the One and Only
God, the Eternal, Absolute
He has no children, nor was He born
And nothing is like Him
Say, I seek refuge with the Guardian Evolver of the dawn
From the harm of created things
From the harm of darkness as it overspreads
From the harm of those who whisper into convictions
And from the harm of the envious one as he practices envy
Say, I seek refuge with the Guardian Evolver of humanity
The King of humanity
The God of humanity
From the harm of the whisperer, who withdraws after he whispers
And who whispers into the hearts of humanity
Among jinn and humanity
